owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A newspaper. Tabloids are usually thought of as more "down-market" than broadsheets.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: tabloid
male
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of all male things.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: bicycle
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A human propelled vehicle, with two wheels
A newspaper. Broadsheets are usually considered to be more "high-brow" than tabloids.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: broadsheet
newspaper
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All newspapers are either broadsheets or tabloids.
A mad cow is a cow that has been eating the brains of sheep.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: mad cow
white van man
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A white van man is a man who drives a white van.
A vegetarian is defined as an animal that eats no other animals, or parts of animals.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: vegetarian

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has_pet
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Anyone that has a pet must like that pet.

ns0:male.rdfs:comment: Mick is male and drives a white van.
